experience.UseOurNewPlatform: the wings of a smart and powerful bird
experience.paragraph1: A world of opportunity and a world of possibilities for all the people of the world, together

why-chose.To the home cook: Because owlegram meets all your needs. You have a software in your phone that you don't need to install any other software and you can meet your daily needs and more importantly create a job for yourself and earn money.

service.service: Everything you need in one software
service.paragraph1: What service do you want, do you want strong messengers? Do you need a job? What is your specialty? Do you need to buy a device? Are you looking to buy or rent a property or car? Do you need a means of transportation? Are you looking for a consultant or a repairman? Are you looking for games, movies, series and theater? Do you need to work in forex, crypto, and NFT, are you interested in Metaverse and the facilities around it? Are you looking for technical training and learning? Do you want to use social networks? All your needs are there in Owlegram with unique ideas and connected as a neural network.

payment.paragraph1: You can store your payments and receipts in your own wallet in a secure environment. Buying and selling using the software's exclusive currency, which can be stored in your wallet, earns you money and you can easily transfer it to your accounts in your other wallets. It is done entirely on the blockchain platform with the lowest fees and transfer costs

transfer.transfer: Free transfer anywhere around the world
transfer.paragraph1: You can easily communicate with all the people of the world, the artificial intelligence of the software recognizes your contact and your correspondence with it or with you becomes your main language. You can easily have different friends all over the world.

Chat&Group.paragraph1: In your software, you have a powerful messenger with special features and ideas that you can easily use all its features, create professional groups or channels, have friends or private groups that no one has access to, in completely secure rooms. And talk to your friends confidentially and there are thousands of other interesting and varied features in these messengers.

Voice&VideoCall.paragraph1: In your software, you can easily make audio and video calls with your friends, hold multi-person meetings, hold various conferences, these facilities are used throughout your software and in the required sections. The best quality of voice and video call with a world of possibilities is available in your software.

why-chose.paragraph1: To the home cook, having the right pots and pans is essential for a properly functioning kitchen. You may be wondering what the best pot for vegetables is

services.paragraph1: This software has more than 70 diverse and efficient packages for your use, a general explanation of some of them will be provided below. If you need to see the rest of the software packages, you can install it, it will definitely have everything you need and it can help you a lot.

download-app.paragraph1: Depending on the type of operating system of your mobile phone, download and install the software from Google Play or App Store. I hope you enjoy using it and become friends with this kind owl with a world of possibilities and it will be a good friend for you.

team.paragraph1: This software consists of a very large production team of young people from different countries such as South Korea, the UAE and India, who work in a centralized and powerful manner in the direction of its production, development, maintenance and support. Below you can see the senior managers of the software, and in the future, in another section, we will try to introduce all the people who help in the production, maintenance and support of this software, and here we thank all of them for their commitment and efforts.

faq.paragraph1: General questions that can guide you. There are more comprehensive instructions in the software that you can use after installing it.
faq.text1: our team will answer all your question، we ensure a quick response

footer.4: Owlegram is a complete and lovely app for everyone with a smartphone, from a 7-year-old to a 100-year-old human.
footer.5: Send us your suggestion and criticism
